QuestData.Title: News from Nagrand
QuestData.Description:
One of your soldiers stopped by asking for you while you were out. Something about a caravan heading out to Nagrand.
Whatever it was, it can't have gone well for them. That's Warsong territory.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Bodrick Grey at your garrison in Shadowmoon Valley.
QuestData.RewardText:
Commander. Good to have you back.
We've got some movement in Nagrand. The board can fill you in on the details.
